lastRelease.name: Release-461
lastRelease.description: Triggered By Pull Request for repo: pcs-adf-payroll360, Branch: refs/pull/2178/merge and Pull request Id 2178

inputs.Inline:
# You can write your azure powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments

# You can write your azure powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments
$triggersADF = Get-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -DataFactoryName pcs-adf-payroll360-qa -ResourceGroupName pcs-rg-payroll360-project

$triggersADF | ForEach-Object { Stop-AzDataFactoryV2Trigger -ResourceGroupName pcs-rg-payroll360-project -DataFactoryName pcs-adf-payroll360-qa -Name $_.name -Force }
